data.name: XStreamListener
desc: makes it possible to receive events from an active data control.

methods.name: closed
desc: gets called when data transfer terminates normally or when data transfer is terminated from outside.
The termination could be done using the method XActiveDataControl.terminate().

methods.name: error
desc: gets called when an internal error in source or sink has occurred.
After the method is called, the close is called on the connected streams.

methods.name: started
desc: gets called as soon as data transfer has started.

methods.name: terminated
desc: gets called when XActiveDataControl.terminate() is called.
